text: @JoeBiden Thank you. I needed to hear that... I think we all needed to hear that. From the bounty on our Military that Trump is allowing, to Native Americans being gassed last night, to the hateful tweets and speeches, to the danger of Coronavirus being ignored and lied about..we need this
